u-chips/type.description: Type of input box, currently supports two types: default and `'searchInput'`

u-chips/rules.description: Validation rules for each input string

u-chips/list-rules.description: Verification rules for chips, such as quantity range, whether duplicates are allowed, etc.

u-chips/separators.description: Specify the input delimiter. When set to `'comma'` or `'space'`, specify comma or space as the delimiter respectively
